ComicInfo.Series: Yumiko: Curse of the Merch Girl
ComicInfo.Summary: A dark fantasy drama in a modern setting, Yumiko finds her perfect little life as the merch girl for her boyfriend's band going to Hell - literally. Yumi must help her friends realize they're caught in the middle of an ancient conflict between a god of excess and his jilted lover, before everyone dies as a result of it. This project redefines the possibilities of what comics can do when crossed with music, and is supported by an online animated music video.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-03 16:14:59. [CVDB427917]
